CIRCULAR NO. AS - 06/ 2009

Sub: Issue of NOGs to Sis at Airports : Reg

Airport Sector Circular No, AS-12/2006 dated 17 Aug'2006 clearly mandates that
resignations submitted by Sub Inspectors deployed at airports must not be accepted by
the concerned appointing authorities (Commandants) before referring each such matter
to Airport Sector HQ.

2. In continuation to the. above instructions, it is further directed that no No
Objection Certificates (NOCs) for outside employment in respect of Sls deployed at
airports will be issued by the concerned controlling authorities till clearance for the
same is received from Airport Sector HQ. Thus, all such requests for issue of NOCs
should also be referred to this office for consideration.

3. Strict compliance of the above instructions should be ensured with immediate
effect.
